snippet: A guilty plea by Pedro Espada Jr. is expected to resolve all remaining charges against him and his son, Pedro G. Espada.
abstract: Guilty plea by former Democratic State Senator Pedro Espada Jr. is expected to resolve all remaining charges against him and his son Pedro G Espada, including tax evasion; senator was convicted in May of stealing more than $400,000 from Soundview Health Center in the Bronx, a group of health clinics he founded and ran.
lead_paragraph: A guilty plea by Pedro Espada Jr. is expected to resolve all remaining charges against him and his son, Pedro G. Espada.

headline.seo: Ex-Senator Espada to Plead Guilty in Theft Case
headline.main: Espada to Plead Guilty to Remaining Charges After Being Convicted of Theft
headline.print_headline: Espada to Plead Guilty to Remaining Charges After Being Convicted of Theft
